Liked the look but these slide back and forth and are always at different lengths to each other. They need a second strand to put the stopper on. Waste of money!

After ONE wear the star broke off of the chain when I was removing it from my ear. I was not overly rough, just tugged like any other earring. I returned it and ordered a replacement thinking maybe I was just unlucky and it was a fluke. I was wrong. After a few weeks (I only wore it maybe 2 times) one of them also broke AGAIN, only this time I wasn't even wearing it, it just broke from moving it. I regret not returning the first broken pair because it's clearly very poor quality. The loop that attaches to the star is extremely fragile. It's only a matter of time when it will break. Do not buy.
I love dainty earrings and have been looking a while for a unique pair of theader earrings. They are more smaller than I expected but I still love them!
Bought these for my daughter for Christmas and she has gotten so many compliments and even her twenty year old cousins purchased after seeing them. Great looking and value for price.
Very pretty. Good quality jewelry and inexpensive.

Minimalistic, elegant and comfortable. Threaders are impossible to find in stores so I thought I would roll the dice and try these. So happy I did. These are just as pictured--they look great either threaded from either direction or threaded thru two piercings. I have worn these every day since I got them--thinking of buying another pair in a different colors.  So happy with my purchase.
